title: Graduate Research Assistant, WWU Münster
text: Creation of binderhub.wwu.de as part of my Master's thesis. I forked and remodeled the back end and Kubernetes setup of BinderHub (part of the Jupyter ecosystem) to minimize the attack surface of the underlying Kubernetes cluster of WWU university.

title: Student Software Developer, PAQATO GmbH, Münster
text: Development of Shopware (E-Commerce platform) plugins with PHP and rollout of Prometheus based Monitoring of PAQATO's data flows.

title: Freelance Software developer, InforIntelligence, Amsterdam (Remote)
text: Built an MVP for a company indexing software using Python, Scrapy and Google Cloud Platform to collect data about 1000s of businesses.

title: Student Junior BI Engineer, Bloomon, Amsterdam (Remote)
text: Implemented various API's for ad campaign spending reporting with Python and Swagger.

title: M.Sc. Information Systems (Wirtschaftsinformatik), WWU Münster
text: Master's degree in Information Systems with emphasis on Software Engineering and Data Analytics, incl. Neural Networks, Clustering and Data Mining.

title: Intern Business Intelligence, Bloomon, Amsterdam
text: Support of migration from a simple MySQL based data warehouse to data warehousing with Google Big-Query. Various data analysis and reporting tasks using Tableau, Google Sheets and Pandas/Jupyter.

title: B.Sc. Business Information Systems (Wirtschaftsinformatik), Leipzig University
